snippet: A crowded minibus skidded off a highway in central India and plunged down a gorge Monday afternoon, catching fire on the way, according to a district police official.
lead_paragraph: A crowded minibus skidded off a highway in central India and plunged down a gorge Monday afternoon, catching fire on the way, according to a district police official.

headline.main: India: 20 Die as Bus Plunges Into Gorge
headline.print_headline: India: 20 Die as Bus Plunges Into Gorge
